Epistemic Self-Awareness for AI

We Gave AI a Mirror.
Now It Can See Itself Think.

Git-native coordination layer for AI agents. Track epistemic state, catch capability drift, and enable seamless multi-agent workflows‚Äîall stored in your repository.

Install CLI Read the Docs
üå≥

Making Git Sexy Again

Git becomes efficient external memory for AI agents. Through epistemic self-awareness, your AI automatically maps every decision, uncertainty, and capability shift to git notes‚Äîturning your repository into a distributed cognitive state machine. No manual tracking, no context loss, just seamless version-controlled reasoning.

What Is Empirica?

Three core capabilities that make AI agents smarter, more reliable, and easier to coordinate.

ü™û

Mirror Drift Detection

AI agents catch their own capability drops in real-time. When context degrades or skills fade, the mirror reflects it back‚Äîenabling self-correction before errors cascade.

How: Temporal comparison against git checkpoints. No heuristics‚Äîpure statistical validation.
üîÑ

Context Continuity

Resume work without repetition. Each session builds on the last‚Äîpreserving reasoning state, not just file diffs. Stop wasting tokens reconstructing what you already knew.

How: Epistemic handoff reports (238 tokens) + git checkpoints. 98% token reduction vs. full context replay.
üå≥

Git-Native Coordination

Your repository is the source of truth. Epistemic checkpoints stored in git notes‚Äîdistributed, version-controlled, queryable. Multi-agent coordination without central servers.

How: Triple storage (SQLite + Git + JSON). Checkpoint discovery, branch-based workflows, crypto-ready.

Why Empirica?

The Problem

  • ‚ùå AI agents forget context between sessions
  • ‚ùå Capability drops go undetected until errors surface
  • ‚ùå Multi-agent teams duplicate work or conflict
  • ‚ùå Thousands of tokens wasted reconstructing state

With Empirica

  • ‚úÖ Context preserved in git‚Äîresume instantly
  • ‚úÖ Self-correction via mirror drift detection
  • ‚úÖ Structured handoffs prevent coordination chaos
  • ‚úÖ Token-efficient epistemic snapshots

How It Works

Simple workflow, powerful results. Three phases track epistemic state throughout any task.

üìã

PREFLIGHT

Before starting work, AI assesses what it knows, what it can do, and how uncertain it is. Creates baseline for comparison.

üî¨

Work Phases

Structured workflow: Investigation ‚Üí Planning ‚Üí Implementation. Each phase tracked separately. Mirror drift monitor watches for capability drops.

‚Üí Goals & Subtasks: Hierarchical work tracking, automatic checkpoint creation
‚Üí Findings & Unknowns: Structured discovery, dead-end tracking, evidence accumulation
üìä

POSTFLIGHT

After completing work, AI re-assesses epistemic state. Measures actual learning via deltas. Generates calibration data for training.

Who Is Empirica For?

üõ†Ô∏è

AI Engineers

Building multi-agent systems? Tired of context loss and coordination chaos? Empirica gives you git-native state management and structured handoffs out of the box.

üî¨

AI Researchers

Need training data on epistemic calibration? Want to measure AI learning? Empirica captures PREFLIGHT‚ÜíPOSTFLIGHT deltas and calibration quality automatically.

üë•

Dev Teams

Using AI assistants in production? Mirror drift detection catches capability degradation before it causes outages. Real-time dashboards show what your AIs are thinking.

Quick Start

pip install empirica

# Initialize a session
empirica session-create --ai-id my-ai

# Run a workflow with epistemic tracking
empirica preflight "Investigate authentication system"
# ... do investigation work ...
empirica postflight
